the southeastern Swiss Alps, forms part of the Swiss-Austrian, Swiss-
Liechtenstein border, Swiss-German and then the Franco-German border, then 
flows through the Rhineland and eventually empties into the North Sea in the 
Netherlands. ... The many castles and fortifications along the Rhine testify to its 
importance...
